channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The light is not working outside my home, 1st February
item.description:
The light stopped working like a week ago at first was flashing but now its not working wish makes it really scary as i live right in the corner where the bin covers light from the street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redcar Street, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti Selborne Road for removal please, 1st February
item.description:
Previously reported under FixMyStreet ref: 8658358 on 9th January 2026!!! Graffiti 1) NOSE black acoustic wall Morrisons (car park side), 2) MALDOG Red Danger door in Morrisons car park, 3) MAFIOSO on tree opposite side of road and on lamp post - both bordering walkway into Allendale Close entrance by 74 Allendale Close. Could these all be removed please. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daneville Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Miss paid collection, 1st February
item.description:
Paid for fridge collection. Claimed it was colllected on the 05/12/2025. Unfortunately this is not true and is still in the same place on the 01/02/2026. As this has been paid for would it be possible to have it collected. Please find photos and screen shots for reference.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queensgate Mews, Beckenham, Greater London

item.title: Outside 2A Brondesbury Road, 1st February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Road, London

item.title: Somerhill Road Road Sign Missing, 1st February
item.description:
Location: Somerhill Road near Kenmere Road junction. North side of road. Issue: No Road sign on north side of road. Apparently, high winds brought down a wall which crashed onto and broke the road sign!

item.title: Children pouring paint and writing on exteriors at 21 Whiston Road, 1st February
item.description:
At 31st Jan, 2026, around 5:14pm near 21 Whiston Road, E2 8EX. Three children found cans of paint and kicked it on the pavement. One of them used paint to vandalize building walls. The cans rolled towards the road and cars drove over, which was dangerous.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Graffiti sprayed at 374 Brixton road SW9., 1st February
item.description:
Graffiti has been sprayed at 374 Brixton road SW9. The graffiti is against a brown shutter. Please can it be removed. There is also a fair amount of graffiti on the walls that leads towards Brixton tube station. A majority of it can be jet-sprayed off. The graffiti has been there for approximately over a month.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 376, Brixton Road, Brixton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders who ar not working in our flats using our bins to put there waste, 1st February
item.description:
This year our bins have become the flytipping bins of stamfordhill each time they are cleared within 12 hours they are full most of the time there is also furniture and random things just chucked around them. This is being done not by the residents

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lewis Gardens, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering, 1st February
item.description:
Since Christmas break the occupants of 128 left kids item and other garbage not following council rules for disposal on the side walk. A month passed and they have more and more litter left on the path. This part of the sidewalk is starting to be disgusting and unsanitary. Thanks to have a look

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Basildon Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous slippery pavement and rubbish on floor, 1st February
item.description:
I am writing to raise an urgent and serious complaint regarding the ongoing fly-tipping and waste accumulation outside number 73 Southampton Way, which has now escalated into a clear health and safety hazard. Due to cardboard being left on the pavement and becoming wet, the surface has turned extremely slippery. I have already slipped as a result. This is no longer just an issue of cleanliness, it is a dangerous obstruction that poses a real risk of injury to residents and passers-by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southampton Way, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting on roundabout has failed again, 1st February
item.description:
Street light on roundabout Westmount Road has again failed to illuminate again for the last 2 evenings this is the 3rd time in a couple of months please can someone rectify this matter as soon as possible, thankyou

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westmount Road, Eltham
